answers.answer: That's what we plan to do we was told we had to wait till the 1st of the month

Yeah my only say move out. Any cheap hotels? I think you can try to talk to her but state you appreciate her letting you stay here and you feel she is annoyed you are there and you are trying to move out but can't until the 1st. Ask her to work with you and you'll try to and be a team until you can part.

question: Okay so I stay with my dad's ex girlfriend and my boyfriend does to and he has type 1 diabetes and he got very sick This morning and she was acting like she didn't want to take him to the emergency room and then when she did get ready to take him she gave me a list of things to do so that I couldn't go with him it's like nothing cause make this woman happy the other night she got mad at me because I wasn't getting her son ready for bed fast enough she gets mad for small things it's draining me and plus I haven't had any sleep I been getting sick and it's like she don't care because we choose to stay away from stressful things some time can someone please help me understand Why she is like this and then when I just get very quite she accuses me of having an attitude I been feeling like giving up lately for this to be my first pregnancy I feel like it's tearing me apart
title: major stressed
